author: Daan Derksen
comment: Does what it is supposed to do but unfortunately has some small bugs and it seems even though it received financial support the development stopped.
Works fine however I would love to see websockets based interface probably using MyDomoticz for a superior realtime experience.

author: Yvan Dimitrov
comment: Overall OK and easy to configure. Unfortunately it is missing tasked integration.

author: Nicolas Bernaerts
comment: Very simple and very efficient domoticz client. Thanks.

author: Michael Thonfors
comment: Widgets break every time there is an update. So you need to remove all of them and put new ones to your screen every update. Allso they take up a lot of room. Dont need 3x1 just to show a temperature. Make them scalable. Otherwise quite ok app.

author: Arjan Neet
comment: Not all functions work, can't change temperature for example, which I can if I just login through webbrowser.

author: Yaron Shoshani
comment: The wigit does not work

reply.author: HNO Mobile Games
reply.content:
sorry, we now that there are issues with the widgets.
That's why they are in 'not released' status

author: Pasi Vähämaa
comment: Good

author: Filip Szymanski
comment: Perfect app for perfect HA system. It's a must have.

author: Younes Sammour
comment: Great app! Works great but Displaying a température sensor with the day sub button seems strange, right now it's 19:52 and it displays from 09:54 to 09:06, descending order to 00:00 then going down to 11/10/09  Would appreciate a look!
Vibrate on notification isnt working. Please fix. Tried the lite and now got the full version. Nice app and the Domoticz suite itself is great. Thanks to the developers

author: martin keatley
comment: Works well with my aotec labs snd Raspberry pi- Update still working

author: mick28
comment: Does what it says on the tin!

author: Brian Jac
comment: Love it

author: Tony Eyles
comment: Help manual?   I'm trying to get the voice commands working, but it is not intuitive.  A user manual or Hep button would assist.

author: Jos Vaassen
comment: Missing the possibility to couple nfc to a scene.... The scenes are now in the list for NFC and geofence, but are not selectable or not activated.

author: Aleksey Boytsov
comment: Cameras do not work in app, but they do on web.

author: peter carlyle
comment: I have found the android button for small buttons, now to find it for ipad.

author: Niko Kulasic
comment: Nice!Please add option for 24h format to graphs

author: John Ellis
comment: Could be better presented, but functionality is ok. Multiserver is essential

author: Matt B
comment: Love the product and app.

author: Revell Volschenk
comment: Great app, quick and responsive.

author: kalman hevessy
comment: This is my first home automation attempt. Running on raspberry Pi3 with a few dimmers,smoke detectors and several my-sensor sensors. No problems so far for months.

author: Joaquin Pezonaga
comment: Great app

author: Craig Evert
comment: Excellent

author: Rob Freeman
comment: Overall, this is a great app although like others, I also get a blank black images in the cameras screen. I'm also looking forward to the widget being out of beta (soon I hope?)

author: Martijn van der Pol
comment: Camera not working in last version. I only get a black screen while I can see the camera output on the website

author: Harrison Brace
comment: Over all the app is OK. NOT worth the money. Firstly the graphs used for reporting KWH usage are AWFUL! Just line graphs that you have to guess values for as you only get a crosshair, trying to be way to "designy" and sacrificing functionality. The time at the top is by date aligned verticle which is impossible to read and then you have to figure out what date is what day of the week! Just go back to the standard bar charts for the weekly report with the total KWH usage for that day at the top of the damn bar!!! Widgets don't allow dimming, the dashboard isn't customisable in any way other than filters. At least an option to make buttons square "tiles" would save so much space. Also you have to turn on a light BEFORE you see the dimmer bar so you're blinded before you can do anything!

The free app does everything I needed. Bought this for the geofencing. Which is first of all EXTREMELY heavy on battery. And second of all, when inside my geofenced area, it keeps randomly thinking I've just arrived, and thus keeps powering things on randomly.   Domoticz lite is great... Feeling cheated with the paid app though.

author: Michael Visser
comment: Best Domoticz App! Please improve logging support (e.g. logs with a space suffix, etc.)

author: Leo Stahl
comment: How can I see or change how often the data for the widgets gets updated? Otherwise this app is very good!

author: buonaccorsi arnaud
comment: The best.

author: Martijn Plasman
comment: The best Domoticz app in de Playstore

author: Michel l'Amie
comment: I love it! Smart home powerrr provided by Domoticz. It is mature, open source and best of all free.

reply.author: HNO Mobile Games
reply.content:
Please clear cache and reconfigure the app. We've been rebuilding the backend for all the new features... We can help you on the support forum:

https://www.domoticz.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=8884

author: Ivan Petík
comment: Hi. Sorry only for 3 stars but I can not give you more. I bought this apk because I needed control of my  events on my domoticz server which is running on raspberry pi 3. But this function does not work. When I press switch on or off buttom in this apk I get answer faild action. I have got Samsung S5 phone. Do you have any idea how fix this error?

reply.author: HNO Mobile Games
reply.content: Please install the latest domoticz beta version

author: Simon Fellows
comment: The best app for domoticz on your phone! One improvement would be better support for dimmer switches - especially a widget that could support dimming.

author: Alan Aspray
comment: Getting better and better

author: Hayman Aliabdala
comment: Very nice aap please add more to the app so we don't even need a webinterface any more. And bring this to ios please

author: Guillaume Gaucher
comment: Just the best.very versatile

author: Russ Poole
comment: Great app.  But would give it 5* If only the thermostat upper and lower limits could be widened currently limited between 10 and 30.  I have a thermostat for my hot water temperature which is 39C Also frost protection thermostat set to 5C..  Thermostat needs a range of  44 to 0 Also widgets do not work properly.
